snippet: The strike, believed to have been carried out by the United States, took aim at a hub of militancy along the Afghan-Pakistani border.
abstract: Drone suspected of being American fires missiles at compound in northern Pakistan, killing at least four militants.

byline.contributor: Ihsanullah Tipu Mehsud contributed reporting from Islamabad, Pakistan, and Declan Walsh from London.

lead_paragraph: The strike, believed to have been carried out by the United States, took aim at a hub of militancy along the Afghan-Pakistani border.

headline.main: Drone Strike Is Said to Kill 4 Militants in Pakistan
headline.print_headline: Drone Strike Is Said to Kill 4 Militants In Pakistan

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
